concept.title: Referencing Environment Variables
concept.shortdesc: You can reference an environment variable in the configuration file, $SDC_CONF/sdc.properties, as follows: ${env("<environment variable name>")}.

conbody.p: environment variablesreferences in the Data Collector configuration fileData Collector configuration filereferencing environment variablesFor example, you want to display text in the console next to the StreamSets logo indicating whether is running in a development, test, or production environment. You create an environment variable named ENVIRONMENT and populate the variable with the appropriate value: development, test, or production.
